title: Upon Payment of 100% premium as aforesaid, building permission shall be issued in respect of 50% of incentive FSI
clause_text: Upon Payment of 100% premium as aforesaid, building permission shall be issued in respect of 50% of incentive FSI. In no case, Incentive FSI be released without handing over of the PPL, complete in all respects, to TMC.
section: a) Development of Multi Storey Public Parking Lot (PPL) near Metro Stations

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
